definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
Battle of Stalingrad (1942-1943)/also called 斯大林格勒戰役|斯大林格勒战役
pinyin: Si1 da4 lin2 ge2 le4 Hui4 zhan4

sentences.english: Stealth Bombers now gain a bonus to fitting siege missile launchers instead of cruise missile launchers.
sentences.chinese: 隐轰获得了适合会战发射器的加成来代替巡航。

sentences.english: Also, for down times when there are no alliance ops whatsoever just use your alts for making some cash.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，当没有会战的时候，用你的小号挣钱。

sentences.english: Historical battles, and lots of them, illustrating Alexanders major battles.
sentences.chinese: 新增诸多历史战役，囊括所有亚历山大的主要会战。

sentences.english: Added new movie to boot Imperial Company (Julii) and the introductory video.
sentences.chinese: 增加了新的尤利乌斯家族帝国会战开场介绍性动画。

sentences.english: B. C. - The Romans are defeated at the Battle of Cannae by Hannibal.
sentences.chinese: 公元前216年，罗马在坎尼会战中被汉尼拨打败。

sentences.english: She has taken part in a major battle for oil.
sentences.chinese: 她曾经参加过石油大会战。

sentences.english: Napoleon encountered Wellington in the Battle of Waterloo.
sentences.chinese: 拿破伦在滑铁卢之役与威灵顿会战。

sentences.english: You become embroiled in competitive dating battles.
sentences.chinese: 陷入一场你争我夺的约会战。

sentences.english: In the same year in October, Songliao oil battle command authority moved to Saarland map.
sentences.chinese: 同年10月，松辽石油会战指挥机关移驻萨尔图。

sentences.english: There will also continue to be tribe vs tribe PK in certain areas.
sentences.chinese: 在某些地点仍然会有行会战。

definition: to go to war/to engage in war
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
decisive battle/to fight a decisive battle/to fight for supremacy in ...
expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
weaponry/to hold (a weapon)/to wield/to rely on/to depend on/war/battle
